    uams07mmqcom¶

    Results | Participants | Proceedings | Input | Summary (topicrel) | Summary (opinion) | Appendix

    • Run ID: uams07mmqcom
    • Participant: uamsterdam.deRijke
    • Track: Blog
    • Year: 2007
    • Submission: 8/7/2007
    • Type: automatic
    • Task: opinion
    • Run description: Runs constructed using Mixture Model of 0.15 title, 0.60 body and 0.25 background. Query model is constructed using external corpus of AQUAINT-2 (over the same period ad the blog posts) and proper weights are assigned. The number of comments is used as document prior; more comments indicate more discussion and therefore probably a more opinionated post.

    uams07mmqop¶

    Results | Participants | Proceedings | Input | Summary (topicrel) | Summary (opinion) | Appendix

    • Run ID: uams07mmqop
    • Participant: uamsterdam.deRijke
    • Track: Blog
    • Year: 2007
    • Submission: 8/7/2007
    • Type: automatic
    • Task: opinion
    • Run description: Runs constructed using Mixture Model of 0.15 title, 0.60 body and 0.25 background. Query model is constructed using external corpus of AQUAINT-2 (over the same period ad the blog posts) and proper weights are assigned. A list of opinionated words is used to calculate a ratio of these words for each document and this ratio is added as document prior, giving opinionated posts a higher prior probability.

    • Run description: Runs constructed using Indri. Queries are constructed in every possible combination and are expanded using an external corpus; since blog queries are often news related, we used the AQUAINT-2 corpus for extension. No opinion-features added.
